title: Sample Videos
description: We recorded and document real instances of mastery learning sessions. Hopefully they can be useful to start your own sessions.

title: Mastery Learning Types
description: In this website we collected multiple types of real Mastery Learning that we refined during our own courses.

title: Lesson Learned
description: We want to plant the seeds for a community of practice on Mastery Learning for Programming Courses, by making our lessons learned and resources available in an easily adoptable way.
